title: Big Ben's finale in Pittsburgh? Patriots or Bengals? Quinnen Williams; Scott Pioli
itunes:title: Big Ben's finale in Pittsburgh? Patriots or Bengals? Quinnen Williams; Scott Pioli
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Hall of Famer Cris Carter react to Ben Roethlisberger's final game in Pittsburgh on Monday Night Football and they also reflect on Big Ben's hall of fame career. Then the panel debates if the New England Patriots or the Cincinnati Bengals are the bigger playoff threat; and they're joined by Scott Pioli and he shares his thoughts on Big Ben, the Eagles, and playoff runs with young quarterbacks without playoff experience, Lastly, they're joined by Quinnen Williams and he shares why he gives back to the community and how the New York Jets are getting better through mistakes and experience.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
